name: Avoid Functions with a low Comments Frequency (FORTRAN)
description: This is a derived value from the number if comment blocks and statements. The division of the both provides the result of this diagnostic.
rationale:
COMF: Number of blocks of comments per statement in the component (Comments Frequency).
The following formula is used to calculate this metric:
         COMF = (BCOM) / STMT
 where:
         BCOM is the number of blocks of comments in the component,
         STMT is the number of executable statements in the component
